name: mcp-open-library_get_book_by_title
description: Search for a book by its title on Open Library.

title.description: The title of the book to search for.

name: mcp-open-library_get_authors_by_name
description: Search for author information on Open Library.

name.description: The name of the author to search for.

name: mcp-open-library_get_author_info
description: Get detailed information for a specific author using their Open Library Author Key (e.g. OL23919A).

author_key.description: The Open Library key for the author (e.g., OL23919A).

name: mcp-open-library_get_author_photo
description: Get the URL for an author's photo using their Open Library Author ID (OLID e.g. OL23919A).

olid.description: The Open Library Author ID (OLID) for the author (e.g. OL23919A).

name: mcp-open-library_get_book_cover
description: Get the URL for a book's cover image using a key (ISBN, OCLC, LCCN, OLID, ID) and value.

key.description: The type of identifier used (ISBN, OCLC, LCCN, OLID, ID).

size.description: The desired size of the cover (S, M, or L).

name: mcp-open-library_get_book_by_id
description: Get detailed information about a book using its identifier (ISBN, LCCN, OCLC, OLID).

idType.description: The type of identifier used (ISBN, LCCN, OCLC, OLID).
